default.message:
5 Easy Steps to Play Texas Mahjong on iOS

  1. Click the Download button below.
  2. Install Texas Mahjong by opening the downloaded file and saving it locally to your device.
  3. Go to Settings => General => Profiles & Device Management
  4. Click on “XingLong Country KangXing Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd.” => Click Trust
  5. You’re all set and ready to play Texas Mahjong on your iOS device.
